metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5196 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Irssi 0.8.18 before 0.8.21 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read and crash) via vectors involving strings thatare not UTF8.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5196` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.15-5ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.15-5ubuntu3').
